attributes.action: Make the Make the Government fund charities like, Sue Ryder,  PDSA, Cancer Research, NSPCC, Ect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should such good charities like the ones above be funded by the UK public?
when the government spend millions and millions of pounds on useless causes?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
